name: ai.urlcheck/urlcheck-mcp
title: MCP-native URL security scanner that protects AI agent workflows.
description: Analyzes threats and verifies URLs align with the agent's intended goal.

headers.name: X-API-Key
headers.description: Optional for hosted trial access (up to 100 requests/day). Required for higher limits.

tools.name: url_scanner_scan
tools.description: Analyze a URL for security threats including phishing, malware, and suspicious patterns. Supports direct (sync) and task-augmented (async) execution. Returns risk score, confidence, and agent access guidance.

url.description: The URL to analyze. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. If no scheme provided, https:// is assumed.

tools.name: url_scanner_scan_with_intent
tools.description: Analyze a URL for security threats with user intent context. Supports direct (sync) and task-augmented (async) execution. Use when the user states their purpose (e.g., login, purchase, booking)â€”this enables detection of sites that don't match the stated intent. Returns risk score, confidence, and agent access guidance.

url.description: The URL to analyze. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. If no scheme provided, https:// is assumed.

intent.description: User's stated purpose for visiting the URL (e.g., 'login to email', 'book a hotel', 'download software'). Max 248 characters.
